mapper.select:
SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE , BRDHIT FROM TBL_BOARD
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(brdtitle, brdwriter, brdmemo, brddate, brdhit, brddeleteflag) values(#{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter},#{brdmemo},now(),0,'N')
mapper.select: select brdno, brdtitle, brdwriter, brdmemo, date_format(brddate,'%y-%m-%d') brddate from tbl_board where brdno=#{brdno}
